description: This source file defines a Flutter widget called BudgetGaugeChart that visualizes budget utilization as a radial pie chart, using the fl_chart package, with labels showing percentage of budget spent.

classes.name: BudgetGaugeChart
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a radial gauge representing the percentage of budget spent.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BudgetGaugeChart, including a pie chart and overlaying text labels.
